languages.text: [Сломать конструкцию] "Я рискну — уж очень хочется посмотреть как ты верещишь от ужаса".
[Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."
languages.original_text: [Сломать конструкцию] "Я рискну — уж очень хочется посмотреть как ты верещишь от ужаса".

languages.text: [破坏抑制器]“我愿意承担这个风险，我实在是太想看看你惊恐尖叫的样子了。”
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: [破坏抑制器]“我愿意承担这个风险，我实在是太想看看你惊恐尖叫的样子了。”

languages.text: [Das Konstrukt zerstören] "Ich gehe das Risiko ein. Die Aussicht, Euch vor Schrecken kreischen zu hören, ist einfach zu verlockend."
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: [Das Konstrukt zerstören] "Ich gehe das Risiko ein. Die Aussicht, Euch vor Schrecken kreischen zu hören, ist einfach zu verlockend."

languages.text: [Briser la structure] « Je vais prendre le risque. J'ai très envie de vous voir hurler de terreur. »
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: [Briser l'assemblage] « Je vais prendre le risque. J'ai très envie de vous voir hurler de terreur. »

languages.text: [Romper el constructo] «Correré el riesgo. La idea de verte gritar de terror es demasiado tentadora».
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: [Romper el constructo] «Correré el riesgo. La idea de verte gritar de terror es demasiado tentadora».

languages.text: ［建造物を破壊する］「危険を冒さねば。お前が恐怖で悲鳴を上げる姿を見るなんて、ひどく魅力的だ」
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: ［建造物を破壊する］「危険を冒さねば。お前が恐怖で悲鳴を上げる姿を見るなんて、ひどく魅力的だ」

languages.text: [Yapıyı kır] "Riske gireceğim. Dehşet içinde ciyakladığını görme isteğim, bastıramayacağım kadar büyük."
languages.original_text: [Break the construct] "I shall take the risk. The prospect of seeing you shriek in terror is just too tempting."

traits.locale_text: [Yapıyı kır] "Riske gireceğim. Dehşet içinde ciyakladığını görme isteğim, bastıramayacağım kadar büyük."
